summary: Comprehensive testing completed for PAM Concert Discovery App. Backend APIs are working correctly (14/15 tests passed). Frontend renders properly with correct purple branding, onboarding flow works with 2 steps as specified, and dashboard shows appropriate no-profile state. Jambase API integration is properly configured and available.

minor_issues.issue: Connection reset by peer during connectivity test
minor_issues.impact: May affect taste profile building, but this could be temporary network/rate limiting

passed_tests: Events API status endpoint correctly shows has_events_api: false
User CRUD operations (create, get, update users)
Favorites CRUD operations (add, get, remove favorites)
Landing page renders with correct PAM branding and purple colors
Onboarding page works with 2-step flow (name/email â†’ concert preferences + Connect Spotify)
Dashboard loads and shows appropriate no-profile state
Location search components present (city input, radius select, date pickers, discover button)
Purple branding colors (#DED5EB/#380E75) properly applied throughout UI
